message.raw:
Fix bug: wrong default port number
Fix bug: set text on item before setting other details, otherwise
on_globals_model_value_changed gets triggered multiple times and the value is
in fact set back and forth three times instead of just once. This also had the
side effect of the latter changes being treated as interactive and thus not
suppressing auto focusing of the units cell as intended.

message:
Fix bug: wrong default port number
Fix bug: set text on item before setting other details, otherwise
on_globals_model_value_changed gets triggered multiple times and the value is
in fact set back and forth three times instead of just once. This also had the
side effect of the latter changes being treated as interactive and thus not
suppressing auto focusing of the units cell as intended.
